ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] Selo's Consonant Chain
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Hehe, where were all you guys last time we went through this thread?  I fealt like I was the only bard in Norrath who couldn t get chains to work :)
ygData.messageBody:
Tom Henschel wrote:

> At level 49, I too have had Chains and Fear wear off in an unpredictable
> fashion, sometimes right after the effect takes hold.
> IE A Seafury runs in terorr. A Seafury is no longer feared.
>
> Same thing with chains. I have always had this, for months and months. My
> charisma is about 120, depending on what I have equipped.
>
> Fflewduer Fflamson, lvl 49, Cazic-Thule server
>

Hehe, where were all you guys last time we went through this thread? I fealt like I was the only bard in
Norrath who couldn't get chains to work :)
